entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:51 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 1:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
